text: de the following:               -  Combination chemotherapy.                   Tumors of Unknown Origin (the place where the tumor first formed is not known)       Alveolar soft part sarcoma      Treatment of alveolar soft part sarcoma may include the following:               -  Surgery to completely remove the tumor when possible.      -  Radiation therapy before or after surgery, if the tumor cannot be completely removed by surgery.       -  Targeted therapy (angiogenesis inhibitor).      - A
